definition: (arch.) minister/official/noun prefix denoting function or status/a youth

sentences.english: You are a very nice beaus, I believe.
sentences.chinese: 我想你會是一個非常好的情郎。

sentences.english: Occasionally someflamewould come pursuit of her errant swain.
sentences.chinese: 偶爾也有情人追來尋找她行蹤飄忽的情郎。

sentences.english: Flowing Creek expresses its emotion through natural scenery, and conveys the happy feelings of longing for a lover.
sentences.chinese: 《小河淌水》借景抒情，表達思念情郎的美好情感。

sentences.english: I'm very punctual. March is my sweetheart.
sentences.chinese: 我很守約，三月，是我的情郎。

sentences.english: Occasionally some flame would come in pursuit of her errant swain.
sentences.chinese: 偶爾也有情人追來尋找她行蹤飄忽的情郎。

sentences.english: Mrs Hughes has got a fancy man .
While she eventually found out that he had been Jason, yet it was too late.
sentences.chinese: 雖然她最後發現他是一個薄情郎，但爲時已晚。

definition: (dialect) form of address for one's wife/polite form of address for a woman
my husband and master (archaic)/playboy of rich family/pimp
sweetheart/one's true love/the person of one's thoughts
(old) your servant (humble self-reference by young female)
lord/master/young gentleman/male prostitute/catamite/mahjong player disqualified by unintentionally taking in the wrong number of dominoes/(old form of address for one's husband) husband
older brother's wife/sister-in-law/(polite address to a younger married woman) sister
